summary: Five passengers in a bus depot are waiting for a bus that is overdue. To pass the time, they start telling each other horror stories.
cast: Jesse Emery|Marjorie Fitzsimmons|Laurie Pennington|Jim Wolfe|David Wohl|Gary Brown|Jesse Johnson|Thom Delventhal|Bradford Boll|Kimberly Harbour|Michael Meredith|Will Tuckwiller|David R. Hamm|John Marshall|Mike Frasher|Peter Jesus|Lore A. Steinberg|Jim Dickson|Stacy Weddington|Sharon Bleau|Bruno Yanish|Tom McGee|Jenni Cline|Rick Robinson|Craig Weeks|A.V. Gallagher|Virginia Lockewood|Dave Weekley|W. Till Curry|Stephanie Holland|Brooks D. Cunningham|Teresa McCune|B.J. Richardson|John Riggs|Mark Newbrough|J. Paul Henderson|Daniel Boyd|Emily Sanders|Chris Weiskircher|Veronica Jones|Erik Niiler|Brian Lawrence|Milana Bender|Brad Rice
title: El Autobus del Terror
